entry.title: Unclear Code Hurts
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker:: Dario Cannone

Track: General: Python & PyData Friends Code may work or not, but it will always tell a story. Computers will not complain about how you write it (except correct syntax), but human readers will. This talk is about writing clear code and caring for the human beings â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Speaker:: Dario Cannone

Track: General: Python & PyData Friends Code may work or not, but it will always tell a story. Computers will not complain about how you write it (except correct syntax), but human readers will. This talk is about writing clear code and caring for the human beings that will read it. Yourself included.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022. https://2022.pycon.de More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/GSG7KQ Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
